args.justification: All relations in this chunk express the same topical aboutness predicate 'is_about'. Four already use the more specific class label 'topical_aboutness_relation', while this one uses the more generic 'aboutness_relation'. Aligning it to 'topical_aboutness_relation' makes the schema consistent for this shared semantic family without changing the predicate or broad group.
